text: A vivid image of a green frog equipped with tiny swimming goggles. It's placed in an amusing human-like scenario where it is sitting at a quaint caf√©. The amphibian creature is perched on a wooden chair, looking at a menu, seemingly contemplating what to order. A small coffee cup and a little plate with tiny croissant rests on the table in front of it. The whole scene is colored by a soft, late-afternoon sun, casting long, warm shadows. The atmosphere is peaceful, creating a quirky and humorous contrast between the typical image of a frog and this inclination towards human habits.
